title: STK offers $35 lunch menu during Dine LA
statement: STK offers a $35 prix-fixe lunch menu featuring Tuna Tartare Tacos and Steakhouse Skirt Steak during Dine LA Restaurant Week.

citations.quote: enjoy our exclusive prix-fixe menus, including a $35 Lunch featuring Tuna Tartare Tacos and Steakhouse Skirt Steak
